content: materials - 1 skein of purl soho s home life 1 100% cotton each skein is 61 yards/ 33 grams approximately 50 yards required we knit a mitt in every color - a set of us 6 4 mm double pointed needles 2 or long us 6 circular needles 3 for magic loop - stitch markers 4 including one unique gauge 20½ stitches = 4 inches in garter stitch unlaundered note the row gauge in this pattern is not listed because you are simply knitting to a specific length any row gauge will do as long as your stitch gauge is correct size unlaundered approximately 7¾ inches in circumference x 7¾ inches in length laundered approximately 7¾ inches in circumference x 6½ inches in length designed by purl soho designer hiromi glover 7 click here 8 to see even more of hiromi s work 1 https //www purlsoho com/home-life html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23799 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=964 7 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/hiromi-glover-for-purl-soho/ 8 https //www instagram com/mignonnegrise/
